# LOMS JO DB import file example
pub_doi="10.1063/1.432659" #                            Required, only DOI is needed to fetch bibliographic info
pub_title="" #                                          Optional, all pub_* entries can be used to override the DOI lookup if needed
pub_journal="" #                                        Optional
pub_year="" #                                           Optional
pub_url="" #                                            Optional
pub_authors="R. Reisfeld; J. Hormadaly" #               Optional
re_ion="Ho" #                                           Required, can also contain multiple ions in format eg. Ho,Er,...
re_conc_value="3.0000" #                                Required
# re_conc_value_upper="4.0000" #                        Optional, can be used to specify a range of concentrations
re_conc_value_note="Ho2O3; wt of the base glass" #      Optional note regarding concentration
re_conc_unit="wt%" #                                    Required, valid values 'mol%', 'wt%', 'at%', 'ions/cm3'
sample_label="P2O5-Na2O: Ho" #                          Optional, can be used to specify a sample ID used in the publication
host_type="Glass (G)" #                                 Required, valid values 'Glass (G)', 'Glass-ceramic (GC)', 'Polycrystalline (PC)', 'Single-crystalline (SC)', 'Vapor (V)', 'Solution (S)', 'Melt (M)', 'Powder (P)', 'Aqueous (A)', 'Other'
composition_text="50P₂O₅-50Na₂O: Ho₂O₃" #               Required, should contain verbatim composition description from the publication, please use subscripts to properly indicate stoichiometry 0123456789->₀₁₂₃₄₅₆₇₈₉
omega2="5.600000" #                                     Required
omega4="2.720000" #                                     Required
omega6="1.870000" #                                     Required
# omega2_error="0.280000" #                             Optional, can be used to specify the margin of error
# omega4_error="0.410000" #                             Optional
# omega6_error="0.260000" #                             Optional
has_density="0" #                                       Required, valid values 0: not available, 1: unknown, 2: available
# density_g_cm3="1.001" #                               Optional, indicates density if has_density="2"
is_contributor_author="0" #                             Required, valid values 0: contributor is not the author, 1: contributor is the author of this work
refractive_index_option="0" #                           Required, valid values 0: not available, 1: unknown, 2: available (single n value), 3: available (relation n(λ))
combinatorial_jo_option="0" #                           Required, valid values 0: not available, 1: unknown, 2: available
sigma_f_s_option="2" #                                  Required, valid values 0: not available, 1: unknown, 2: available
mag_dipole_option="0" #                                 Required, valid values 0: not available, 1: unknown, 2: available
reduced_element_option="2" #                            Required, valid values 0: not available, 1: unknown, 2: available
recalculated_loms_option="0" #                          Required, valid values 0: not available, 1: unknown, 2: available. Choosing 2 means a concurrent LOMS data file upload is required (right side of the form)
refractive_index_note="" #                              Optional
combinatorial_jo_note="" #                              Optional
sigma_f_s_note="" #                                     Optional
mag_dipole_note="" #                                    Optional
reduced_element_note="" #                               Optional
recalculated_loms_note="" #                             Optional
extra_notes="" #                                        Optional, note pertaining to the record as a whole
# Normalized composition, given in triplets of key-values comp_component, comp_value & comp_unit for each component
comp_component="P₂O₅" #                                 Required, please use subscripts to properly indicate stoichiometry 0123456789->₀₁₂₃₄₅₆₇₈₉
comp_value="50.0000" #                                  Required
comp_unit="mol%" #                                      Required, valid values 'mol%', 'wt%', 'at%', 'ions/cm3'
comp_component="Na₂O" #                                 Optional, only one component entry is required per record, please use subscripts to properly indicate stoichiometry 0123456789->₀₁₂₃₄₅₆₇₈₉
comp_value="50.0000" #                                  Optional, only one component entry is required per record
comp_unit="mol%" #                                      Optional, only one component entry is required per record, valid values 'mol%', 'wt%', 'at%', 'ions/cm3'
